content: In this story, the main characters are likely resonant individuals with strong resonance with the magical realm. They possess the ability to harness the power of the magical realm and use it to cast spells within the physical realm. However, they must be careful in how they use their abilities as each spell comes at a cost. The stronger the spell and the more powerful the caster, the greater the cost in terms of their life force. The characters may also be part of a society that regulates the use of magic and enforces the laws of resonance, or they may be rebels fighting against such a society. They may also discover that the laws of resonance are not absolute, and that there may be ways to circumvent them or gain new abilities. The characters will have to balance the power and potential of their abilities with the cost of using them as they navigate their journey.
